summary: Sarali the Short Ranger (Alleged) Thief from /vg/.
descriptionHtml:
Sarali from /vg/.  She\'s hiding out in The Frozen Hearth Inn in Winterhold.

Due to a couple of bugs in Skyrim she\'ll spawn a hunting bow in her inventory every time you recruit her as a follower and she will unfortunately not level up with you.  To fix these problems I HIGHLY recommend you get one of \"Fixed Followers Lite by manguejoe\" (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9842) which fixes Bethesda\'s Bugs, or either \"UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii\" (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037) or \"Extensible Follower Framework by Expired\" (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12933) which both fix the issues and add extra features as well.

As of v2.0 I made her have stats closer to your own level, and reduced all her items stats to the equivalent of either ebony weapons or glass armor.  That way she should still be somewhat powerful, but hopefully not overly so.  Please let me know if she\'s too powerful to be fun and I will lower her again, hopefully we can find a happy medium somewhere.  Thank you.

[Change Log]
v2.0
-Made her stats scale to player
-Made her items less powerful
-Made Daggers Dual Wield
-Removed most Illusion spells

v1.4
-Removed Turn Lesser Undead (It didn\'t really fit with her character imo)
-Added More Arrows

v1.3
-Added Perks
-Added a couple Spells

v1.2
-Fixed Outfit
-Added Nighttime Sneak

v1
-Release
author: Sarali
